summary: This bill, the "Equitable Community Access to Pharmacist Services Act," amends Title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide Medicare Part B coverage for certain pharmacist services. It defines "pharmacist services," specifying eligible treatments (e.g., COVID-19, flu) and collaboration requirements with physicians. The bill mandates payment for these services, sets reimbursement rates, and prohibits balance billing. The changes apply to services furnished on or after January 1, 2026.
